items.sentence: Although she is gone, I still love her more than anything.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary is in the hospital.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary is already married.
Who did Tom say that he was going to go to Australia with?
Tom didn't think Mary would actually carry out her threat.
I had my palm read by a woman at the Renaissance festival.
There's never enough time to do everything you want to do.
Tom sleeps with his window open, no matter how cold it is.
Tom admitted he was the one who left the windows unlocked.
I would've left on my trip if the weather hadn't been bad.
I'm not sure what I expected mustard greens to taste like.
Tom doesn't have a very good relationship with his family.
If Tom were here with us, everything would be much easier.
If a porter carries your luggage, don't forget to tip him.
I'm sorry, but I won't be able to come to class next week.
Everybody who worked on that project became a millionaire.
It's about time somebody did something about that problem.
I'm sure that the police will catch the robber eventually.
I'm sure that the police will eventually catch the robber.
I didn't want to work with him, but I made the best of it.
